Hi! My name is Yavor, pronounced as /'jɑvoR/, spelled “Явор” in Bulgarian and meaning sycamore.

I am a software engineer, currently building deployment services and tools at scale. I also like cycling, good coffee, guitars and books about where people are headed.

Here you can find random things I’ve done or written whenever I’ve had time and inspiration.
